content.raw:
a few questions:

\* Is calling \`GetFirstElement()\` a prerequisite? (Doxygen provides \`\\pre\` to document prerequisites if needed).

\* What happens if I call say \`GetNextElement("link")\` and somewhere in between I do \`GetNextElement("joint")\`? does that reset anything?

\* Can this method throw under any circumstance?
content.html:
a few questions:

* Is calling `GetFirstElement()` a prerequisite? (Doxygen provides `\pre` to document prerequisites if needed).

* What happens if I call say `GetNextElement("link")` and somewhere in between I do `GetNextElement("joint")`? does that reset anything?

* Can this method throw under any circumstance?
